title.rendered: TARC Tripundra: Live In The Heart Of Delhi

content.rendered:
Tripundra- The name of the project has been chosen very smartly, the property not just attracts the investors but the name also catches the attention of the market. Tripundra is the spiritual symbol of Lord Shiva. You must have seen the three white horizontal lines with a red dot in the center.

Sacred ash is used to make the lines and then put on the forehead, chest, and hand, where one wishes to. The symbol is considered to clean all the sins whoever marks this on the body. The three lines represent the three intentions of man, namely, Kriya Shakti (power of work), Iccha Shakti (power of the will), and Gyana shakti (power of knowledge). All the accumulated sins of life can be removed by applying Tripundra.

This concludes that Tripundra is all about purity and peace eradicating all the negativities, similarly, the builder has planned the project providing the living aura of the community- positive and happening bringing smiles and abundance in the life of residents.

On that note, it is imperative to know about the builder.

Welcome To TARC- The Anant Raj Corporation

With the thought of spreading out and providing the best, this builder has come up with strong capabilities in conceptualizing and executing the projects. Established over four decades this builder has expanded the arms in the entire area of Delhi-NCR.

40 years of experience
300 acres of land in New Delhi
550 acres of land in Delhi NCR
More than 20Mn Sq. ft already delivered
Each project is made with the vision of bringing a strong asset to a market where the investments are always beneficial. The team has a deep understanding of this dynamic market and how, when, and where to play. TARC has created landmarks in prime locations bringing benefits and wealth. Having projects in eye-catching locations gives a huge advantage to the builder. The team of the group always stays geared up to provide the constructions that will put immense value in the market and bring outstanding projects.

Location Is Unmatched- Go Back To The Roots Of Delhi

This housing community is planned in the location- of Main Bijwasan Road which will bring manifold benefits. It is rightly placed at the intersection of Gurgaon and Dwarka amidst Pushpanjali Greens. It is one of the finest locations in Delhi NCR that brings seamless connectivity and matchless proximity to Aeocity and Delhi Airport.

Tripundra Residences New Delhi is a stone’s throw away from Pushpanjali Farms, West End Greens, Vasant Vihar, and Dwarka. Being located on the Main Bijwasan Road this housing community will bring maximum ROIs. With the revolutionary changes, this real estate market is witnessing this location will see prolific growth in the coming years, so investment over here at this time will be the smartest decision of your life.

TARC Tripundra Delhi- Project For The Elevation Of Living Standards

Fully-fitted spaces and luxury: Well expansive space is offered here where 190 families can stay and enjoy the beautiful options provided here. Tripundra is the community where every corner is created to add a feeling of belonging.

Tripundra housing community provides you with the space that’s built around your comfort. It comes with a design that you can customize according to your choice and also ensures elegant living. Here you get the custom design options and flexible layout plans to let you create a space that looks striking. 10’3” Floor to Floor Height for that diminutive extra space between you and the roof. Each apartment is with elegant light fittings adding a contemporary touch to your abode.
